NFL and its players union met for two hours in Dallas to talk about a new labor deal, their first formal bargaining session in more than two months. The sides issued a joint statement, saying they plan to increase the number, length and intensity of bargaining sessions so they can reach agreement before the collective bargaining agreement expires March 4. I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night," Zahi Hawass , chairperson of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said.
